cause.description:
The Empire, guided by the dark hand of Lord Palpatine, as cast a dark cloud over the universe. We are the ones who will stand against the shadow and bring down The Empire, restoring peace to the Universe--while using light sabers every chance we get, of course. We also got wookies and e-woks, so suck it Palpa-suck ass.
1. Bring down The Empire
2. Restore power to The Republic
3. The superfluous use of light sabers
4. The force, bitch!
cause.mission: Rebel against The Empire and to restore the ideals of The Republic
cause.name: The Rebel Alliance
